import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import { Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image'; import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; function ContainerExample() { const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([]); const [showCart, setShowCart] = useState(false); const handleBuyClick = (item) => { const existingItem = cartItems.find(cartItem => cartItem.name === item); if (existingItem) { setCartItems(cartItems.map(cartItem => cartItem.name === item ? { ...cartItem, quantity: cartItem.quantity + 1 } : cartItem )); } else { setCartItems([...cartItems, { name: item, quantity: 1 }]); } }; const handleQuantityChange = (itemName, increment) => { setCartItems(cartItems.map(item => { if (item.name === itemName) { const updatedQuantity = item.quantity + increment; return { ...item, quantity: updatedQuantity > 0 ? updatedQuantity : 0 }; } return item; }).filter(item => item.quantity > 0)); }; const handleCartToggle = () => { setShowCart(!showCart); }; const totalItemsInCart = cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.quantity, 0); return ( PizzaHouse
